comment.text: This translation key displays the balance information within the wallet settings page, specifically on the "Wallet Info" sub-component. The exact wording and formatting of the balance value will be determined by the balance amount displayed.

usage.context:
fontWeight="600"
 fontSize="14px"
 >
 {t("ProductNameWallet", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <div className={styles.walletInfoBalance}>
 <Trans
 t={t}
 i18nKey="Balance"
 ns="Payments"
 values={{ balance }}
